ygData.subject: Magician Reseach
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there, I just joined and I am a Magician on the Povar server.  I have pretty much decoded my 1st and 2nd book, but I haven t tried doing research (most of
ygData.messageBody:
Hi there, I just joined and I am a Magician on the Povar server. I have
pretty much decoded my 1st and 2nd book, but I haven't tried doing research
(most of the stuff in my 1st and book I have already). I have some
questions, so here is a small message I posted to my guildpage earlier
today. There is a really slight spoiler below for one of the magicians
spells which I use as an example for a question I have :
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
*
-----------
Ok....I keep asking around and I keep getting 15 different answers. A GM
told me you don't need a blank parchment and quill in the container when
you combine. Now do you need this in your inventory instead? Someone I
asked told me you need the parchment and quill in your inventory to make
the spell but I don't know who is right.

Also, what is really confusing is the fact that the magicians spells list
other spells as part of their ingredient. Perhaps you guys can tell me if
your books do this took. See example :


*********************
Summon Elemental Mist:
Lesser Summoning Air
Words of Duress
The Scent of Marr
*********************

It lists "Lesser Summoning Air" as one of the ingredients. Some players
have posted to a list that I subscribed to a while back, saying you need to
combine the spell it lists as one of the ingredients. However I asked a
few people that told me you just need to have the
spell WRITTEN in your spellbook in order to create the next level version
of it. Is this true? And is this the same with the necro/wiz/enchanter
spells?
----------

Finally, if anyone wants another spoiler for the 3rd magicians book, you
can go to the URL here (hopefully it will still be up) :
http://www.eqvault.com/boards/mshop/messages/27001.shtml

Zolthar
